form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: Miami Managua Lions Club de Leoneses Miami Managua\nForm Number: Not visible in the image provided.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/7/2023 DE AMERICA CENTRAL SERVE Miami Managua Lions Club DR. POLIDECTO CORREA Presidente (305) 556-8928 Club de Leones Miami Managua CESAR N. CASTRO E. Secretario Founded in - Fundado en 1984 (305) 696-4893 P.O.Box 651045 - Miami, Florida 33265 DR. OSCAR SARAVIA Tesorero (305) 324-0238 DR. RENE QUINONEZ TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: 1er. Vocal (305) 871-6836 We do issue this certification at the City of Miami, - EDUARDO HISLOP JR. 2do. Vocal (305) 681-3718 County of Dade, State of Florida, on November 6th, A.D. 1989.
